name: G-Max Wildfire
effect: The fire type user can choose to use this instead of Max Flare while Dynamaxed. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Additionally, roll 2 Dice of Damage against all foes at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 turns.
description: The user blasts out a flame that almost has a mind of its own, quickly swirling around the opposition.
